home.heroTitle: Reduce your trading costs. Keep more of your edge.
home.heroSubtitle: Cloud Speed compares trading costs and rebates across multiple brokers so you don’t have to guess where your capital is treated best.
home.disclaimer: Cloud Speed is not a broker and never handles client funds. Rebates are paid directly by the brokers.
home.snapshotSubtitle: Illustrative net cost per lot based on typical spread and rebate assumptions.

steps.title: Select your product
steps.text: Start from XAUUSD or major FX pairs — more symbols will be added as liquidity is mapped.

steps.title: Compare all‑in costs
steps.text: See typical spread, rebate and estimated net cost side‑by‑side across supported brokers.

steps.title: Open with rebate
steps.text: Open an account with the broker you prefer. Rebates are paid through the broker’s own system.

traders.title: Active traders
traders.text: Scalpers, intraday and swing traders who care about every pip of cost.

ea.title: EA & copy traders
ea.text: Systematic strategies that are sensitive to spread, swap and execution quality.

ib.title: IBs & communities
ib.text: Leaders who want a transparent way to show members where costs are lower.

compare.title: Compare
compare.text: Benchmark all‑in trading costs and rebates across multiple brokers for key instruments.

insights.title: Insights
insights.text: Market context and cost‑focused views that help you understand where cost and execution matter most.

brokers.title: Brokers
brokers.text: A curated list of brokers Cloud Speed works with, including key stats and cost notes.

compare.title: Compare broker costs on XAUUSD
compare.subtitle: Illustrative comparison of spread cost, rebate and estimated net cost per lot. Data is indicative only.
compare.note: Figures are for illustration only and may not reflect current live trading conditions. Always verify details on the broker’s own website.

insights.title: Cloud Speed Insights
insights.subtitle: Cost‑first perspectives on markets, instruments and execution.
insights.marketViewText: Use this section together with your own charts. Cloud Speed focuses on cost, not direction, so you stay in control of your strategy.
insights.chartPlaceholder: Chart widget placeholder — you can embed TradingView or your preferred charting later.

blocks.costText: Spread, commissions, swaps and rebates all interact. Seeing them together changes how you evaluate brokers.
blocks.executionText: For high‑frequency or EA trading, slippage and fill quality can matter more than a small spread difference.
blocks.riskText: Cloud Speed does not touch your funds. You trade directly with brokers regulated in their own jurisdictions.

brokers.title: Supported brokers
brokers.subtitle: Cloud Speed does not recommend or endorse any single broker. We highlight cost and structural characteristics so you can decide.

auth.loginSubtitle: In a later phase, you’ll be able to see aggregated rebate information across brokers.
auth.loginPlaceholder: Backend integration is under development. For now, use Compare and Insights without logging in.
auth.signupSubtitle: Account features will arrive after the public Compare release.
auth.signupPlaceholder: Registration is not required to use Cloud Speed’s public compare and insight tools.
